TopicTitle: MY KERBAL SPACE WONT LOAD. help me please!

Articles.Content: So whenever I open my KSP launcher (I play on macOS btw) It has two buttons, one says open, one says update. when I press open KSP itself opens into the loading screen. I wait for a second and it all the suddenly stops about 25% into the load. what I see next to the loading line says "loading asset bundle definitions". so I wait some more. but it never loads anymore. thats where it stops. ive tried updating the game to the most recent version, didn't work. what's going wrong here and how can I fix it?

Have you looked at the log files? There’s one called KSP.txt or KSP.log inside the KSP folder that has some basic information in it, search from the bottom for exceptions, errors or crash reports. There are more detailed logs available but I’m not sure where they are on mac- search for Player.txt or Player.log, and output_log.txt and you might find them. Log files aren’t easy to read for beginners, so you can upload them to a file sharing site and then link to them here for others to take a look at.

Try reinstalling the game from scratch (back up your game save files first!) or checking the file integrity if you can do that through the launcher.

If that doesn’t work, try what’s suggested here: 

 

 

And welcome to the forums!
